invalidUserOrToken: User does not exist or token is invalid, please log in again.
invalidUsernamePassword:
Invalid username or password!
Rules: Username must start with a letter, underscore (_), or dollar sign ($), and can contain letters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers, underscores (_), or dollar signs ($), with a total length of 1 to 32 characters. Password length must be 8 to 32 characters, and must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, and 1 number.
noChanges: No changes were made to user information.
notLoggedInMessage: You are not logged in, click here to log in
passwordSavedMessage: Password has been saved. Click the 'Save' button on the page to change the password.
